# Reference

## Table of Contents

### Classes

#### Public Classes

* [`openproject`](#openproject): Openproject Main class
* [`openproject::configure`](#openproject--configure): Configures openproject

#### Private Classes

* `openproject::install`: installs openproject from package
* `openproject::repository`: sets up repository
* `openproject::system_requirements`: sets up system requirements

## Classes

### <a name="openproject"></a>`openproject`

This is the public class that sets up openproject

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `openproject` class:

* [`release_major`](#-openproject--release_major)
* [`enable_full_text_extract`](#-openproject--enable_full_text_extract)

##### <a name="-openproject--release_major"></a>`release_major`

Data type: `Integer`

The major release number of openproject, affects major version repo and
package

##### <a name="-openproject--enable_full_text_extract"></a>`enable_full_text_extract`

Data type: `Boolean`

When set to true, this will provide the required dependencies for full-text
extraction of attachments.

### <a name="openproject--configure"></a>`openproject::configure`

Configures openproject

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `openproject::configure` class:

* [`root_config_dir`](#-openproject--configure--root_config_dir)
* [`file_mode`](#-openproject--configure--file_mode)
* [`installer_dat_contents`](#-openproject--configure--installer_dat_contents)
* [`timeout`](#-openproject--configure--timeout)
* [`logoutput`](#-openproject--configure--logoutput)
* [`environment_contents`](#-openproject--configure--environment_contents)

##### <a name="-openproject--configure--root_config_dir"></a>`root_config_dir`

Data type: `Stdlib::Absolutepath`

Absolute path String of the configuration directory
Default: '/etc/openproject'

##### <a name="-openproject--configure--file_mode"></a>`file_mode`

Data type: `String`

ACL file mode Integer of the openproject configuration files
Default: 0640

##### <a name="-openproject--configure--installer_dat_contents"></a>`installer_dat_contents`

Data type: `Hash`

Hash of configuration settings that make up for openproject's setup
In it's default setting it provides a basic install with the Apache
webserver as a default reverse proxy.
It should be noted that when using eyaml, the entire hash needs to be
inside your hieradata file where you configure secrets
Default: See 'data/common.yml' for defaults

##### <a name="-openproject--configure--timeout"></a>`timeout`

Data type: `Integer`

Integer value determining the timout for configuring and launching the
Openproject service. Depending on your installation you might want to
increase this.
Default: 600

##### <a name="-openproject--configure--logoutput"></a>`logoutput`

Data type: `String`

String value allowing for logging output of the openproject setup
Default 'on_failure'

##### <a name="-openproject--configure--environment_contents"></a>`environment_contents`

Data type: `Optional[Hash]`

Hash of shell environment keys/values that configure openproject outside
of 'installer.dat' configuration file. This is advanced configuration, be
sure to read on the openproject docmentation site for your version for more
information: https://www.openproject.org/docs/installation-and-operations/configuration/environment/
Default: undef
